name: Christmas Crush - free puzzle games to match candy
name_original: Christmas Crush - free puzzle games to match candy
description:
Do you want to play the best new Christmas game? Be amazed by the best new combos and puzzles!

Switch and match gummy candy for Christmas!

Drop jewels and crush ice in this epic game full of color for kids, girls and all ages!

Have fun playing the top match 3 puzzle game today!!
